txt.en: 'I thank you for that, [placeholder]. You are a worthy [placeholder], worthy even of being a Corsair. There is honour in how you choose to live your life.\n\n'Now I must mourn for my poor men. A moment of silence, if you please.'
You have defeated Hebil, avenging the murdered Corsairs loyal to Jajax

'I thank you for that, [placeholder]. You are a worthy [placeholder], worthy even of being a Corsair. There is honour in how you choose to live your life.\n\n'Now I must mourn for my poor men. A moment of silence, if you please.'

Jajax is at the site of Hebil's massacre.

You should speak with Jajax.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Use the whistle to summon Jajax if you become separated.</rgb>
Jajax bows his head to mourn his men
The site of the massacre is south-west of Calembel.\n\nYou should <rgb=#FF0000>mourn</rgb> Jajax's men at the site of the massacre.
You have mourned Jajax's fallen allies

'Thank you, [placeholder]. You have more honour than any Corsair I have ever met, and the spirit of a fine warrior.\n\n'Be wary when you travel further, friend, especially in Belfalas. If Hebil spoke true, there are three other captains who will seek to hunt us down for treason. That is, if I do not hunt them first! I will bury my men, and then I will go to Belfalas. Perhaps I will see you there, eh?'
'Here we are, as you see. Look at them! They did not deserve such a death for their loyalty to me. Hebil will pay, [placeholder].\n\n'Here is his banner. He waits for my summons.'
Hebil has punished Jajax for allying himself with you in the most horrible way Jajax could ever imagine.
Jajax stands at the site of the Corsairs' massacre, in southern Lamedon.\n\nYou should say farewell to Jajax.

Hebil's banner is at the massacre site in southern Lamedon.

You should use the battle-horn on the banner to call Hebil to battle.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Use the whistle to summon Jajax if you become separated.</rgb>
